text: Lekarevka () is a rural locality (a village) in Taptykovsky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 146 as of 2010. There are 17 streets. == Geography == It is located 28 km from Ufa, 7 km from Taptykovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Lekarevka
